fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
> You may disguise the cause of death.

> During any night, you may kill yourself, and disguise your role and cause of death.

> You may act while dead if you killed yourself. You will mimic the mechanics of the role you disguised your cause of death as.

fields.name: > The game will end normally if you are dead. Example:
fields.value: If only Townies remain, game will end in Town victory.

fields.name: Win Con:
fields.value: > Kill all who would oppose you or have nobody left alive at the end of the game.
